main event: A red, white and orange object was observed in Brookville, Ohio in September 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having a blinking light pattern of red, orange, and white., The sighting lasted for 1 minute or less., The object was reported to be stationary at first., The sighting occurred at 2127 hours on September 7, 1957., There is speculation that the object could be possibly identified as an aircraft or weather phenomenon.
sighted object: a red, white and orange object with blinking lights
witness description: Details not specified in the report.
